1.12.2.Alpha1:
Please ignore the mod version in game.
The first ever alpha release of the Carpet Mod port to Forge is out!
I have managed to port over the following with it:

    ObserversDoNonUpdate
    Flippin Cactus
    TNTDoNotUpdate
    Hopper Counters (Not Tested)
    RSTurbo
    New Light
    FlyingMachineTransparent
    LlamaOverFeedingFix
    PistonGhostBlocksFix
    MiningGhostBlocksFix
    BoundingBoxFix
    CommandCameraMode
    CommandPing
    CommandBlockInfo
    CommandSpawn (Not Tested)
    CommandEntityInfo
    CommandAutoSave
    CommandCounter
    CommandFillBiome

This is an alpha release so don't be surprised to see any Crashes/Bugs......But none have been encountered yet
1.12.2.Alpha2:
Alpha2 is out and i would say we are quite close to the stable state :)
Might be another alpha3 though, but the last one.
But i can confirm that the 1st full release will include server side support and other important features!

    Added carpet logging and HUD Display!
    /spawn command now works
    Added Optimized Despawn Range
    Added /perimeterinfo command
    Fixed ObserversDoNonUpdate

Note: Logging is temporarily missing the tileTickLimit logger
1.12.2.1.0.0:
Full Release!
Added Server-Side support.
Completely ripped off the old Mod Options menu, all carpet rules can now be handled using the /carpet command similar to carpetmod.

New carpet rules ported:

    Carpet commandline settings and forgedcarpet.conf support
    All the commands except /player command have been ported
    None of the carpet rules require a restart to enable/disable
    WatchDogFix
    CtrlQCraftingFix
    TickingAreas
    DisableSpawnChunks
    TileTickLimit
    StackableEmptyShulkerBoxes
    FillLimits and FillUpdates
    CarpetProfiler support

Fixes for old rules:

    Fixed pistonGhostBlocksfix breaking caterpillar engines
    FlippinCactus works with stairs and other blocks now

This version is not compatible with liteloader
1.12.2.1.1.0:
v1.1.0 of ForgedCarpet112 is out and with it comes lots of crash fixes and more!

- Liteloader compatibility!
- Added huskSpawningInTemples rule
- Added silverFishDropGravel rule
- fillUpdates and fillLimits now work for the new /carpetfill, /carpetsetblock and	
  /carpetclone commands. This ensures better compatibility with other mods
- Added the forge update checker. There will be green icon next to my mod whenever
  updates are available.
  
Fixes:
- Fixed profiler crash in nether
1.12.2.1.1.1: Fixed crash with forge only clients
